rows.label: qev025303_MSG0001
rows.name:
Welcome to Army Pizza! Here for a pie? Great!
Er, except...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025303_MSG0002
rows.name:
Well, I still haven't gotten the hang of the ovens here,
so all I can offer are frozen pizzas. Is that okay?
They're 1,000 credits each.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025303_SEL0011
rows.name: Purchase a frozen pizza for 1,000 credits.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025303_SEL0021
rows.name: Tell Shallot you aren't interested in frozen pizza.

rows.label: qev025303_MSG0003
rows.name:
Thanks! I made them exactly how Powell taught me.
Well, except for the frozen part. Anyway, they should
be just about perfect if you can cook them properly.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025303_MSG0004
rows.name:
Yeah, I can't blame you. Cold pizza is one thing,
but frozen? I really need to step up my game...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025303_MSG0009
rows.name:
Oops! Looks like you're short on money.
Sorry, but we're cash only.[ST:wait ]
